text:
Turner | CNN Politics | Software Developer | Atlanta, GA | ONSITE | Full-time

CNN Politics is hiring a Software Developer to join our team! Come join us in this exciting opportunity to contribute your skills and reach a vast audience of 25M unique users a day and help develop the next great experience to showcase the upcoming elections.

We are working with the following technology and require these skills: React, NodeJS, HTML/CSS/SASS, AWS, CircleCI, Docker,

If this sounds like you and want to find out more, see the full description and please apply through our system. Thanks!

http://go.turnerjobs.com/SoftAppDev
